name: QuillStreak
description:
QuillStreak is a fun typing game I'm developing inspired by a combination of Mario Teaches Typing and Typing Of The Dead.

There are different characters, levels and even languages to chose from!

How to play! Menu

First, you'll need to chose to play in Russian or English. Do this by clicking the buttons labelled English and Россий.

Then chose a level, currently you can play: the wild west, the dark forest, and in space! (castle and others coming soon!)

In game

Once you start a level it will play endlessly until you exit. (alt f4)
The game is controlled by successfully typing out the words you can see on screen using your keyboard

Each time you complete all the words the scene will reload and the difficulty will increase.

All feedback is welcome but I would appreciate it if it stayed constructive :D 

Other bits

PLEASE NOTE: I have done my best to ensure that the English dictionary has no "bad" words in it, I cannot do this for the Russian language as I am not yet fluent. Should you come across any in either language please leave a comment and I will take it out
